div.bibl: DIE ABENDPOST, September 7th, 1895. The Federal Pension System.

body.p: Since the middle class and lower class of federal employees have been takes out of politics, these employees are feeling were independent and are getting class-conscious. They study more intensively the Statepension-System of Overses-Countries and are approaching the federal administration in Washington with various prepositions concerning an American Pension Law along new improved lines.
We hope, that with the cooperation of Senate and Congress, our federal employees will be successful with their efforts towards well deserved improvements.
